scripts.link-tests: cd tns-core-modules && npm link && cd ../tests && npm link tns-core-modules
scripts.dev-tests-android: npm run tsc-ti && tns livesync android --path tests
scripts.dev-tests-ios: npm run tsc-ti && tns livesync ios --path tests
scripts.test-watch-android: npm run pretest && concurrently --kill-others "npm run tsc-tiw" "tns livesync android --path tests --watch"
scripts.test-watch-ios: npm run pretest && concurrently --kill-others "npm run tsc-tiw" "tns livesync ios --path tests --watch"
scripts.pretest: npm run link-tests && npm run tsc
scripts.test: npm run test-android && npm run test-ios
scripts.dts-ios: npm run link-tests && rm -rf tns-core-modules/ios/objc* && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH=$PWD/tns-core-modules/ios/objc tns build ios --path tests
